enum iser::IFileLoader::OperationState

Result of operation.

Enumerator:
StateOk  Operation was successfull.
StateAborted  Operation was aborted by user.
StateFailed  Operation failed.

Definition at line 27 of file IFileLoader.h.

enum iser::IFileLoader::QueryFlags

Describe detailed options of query.

Enumerator:
QF_FILE_ONLY  Only operations with specified file name should be considered.
QF_DIRECTORY_ONLY  Only operations with specified directory name should be considered.
QF_ANONYMOUS_ONLY  Only operations without specified path (anonymous) should be considered.

Reimplemented from iser::IFileTypeInfo.

Definition at line 56 of file IFileLoader.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool iser::IFileLoader::IsOperationSupported ( const istd::IChangeable *  dataObjectPtr,
const istd::CString *  filePathPtr = NULL,
int  flags = 0,
bool  beQuiet = true 
) const [pure virtual]

Returns true if object dataObject can be loaded/saved.

Parameters:
dataObjectPtr optional pointer to data object should be loaded/stored. It can be NULL if any object is meant.
filePathPtr optional pointer to file should be loaded/stored. It can be NULL if any file is meant. If it points at empty string, anonymous loading is mean.
flags combination of flags defined in QueryFlags and iser::IFileTypeInfo::QueryFlags.
beQuiet if true, no user message output is allowed.

Implemented in ibase::CComposedLoaderComp, ibase::CRegistryCodeSaverComp, ibase::CTextFileLoaderComp, ibase::TFileSerializerComp< ReadArchive, WriteArchive >, iqt::CBitmapLoaderComp, iqt::CClipboardSerializerComp, iqt::CRenderedObjectFileLoaderComp, iqt::CSettingsSerializerComp, iqtgui::CFileDialogLoaderComp, iqtmm::CMediaLoaderComp, iqtmm::CSvgBitmapLoaderComp, and ibase::TFileSerializerComp< iser::CXmlFileReadArchive, iser::CXmlFileWriteArchive >.
